content: bandana cowl yarn used berocco quechua or any sport weight yarn needles us 3 3 25mm circular 16 gauge 22 sts/ 32 row = 4 in stockinette stitch blocked sizes baby/toddler child adult definitions m1l make one left m1r make one right pm place marker begin by casting on 74 90 120 stitches join in the round placing a marker at the beginning of round work 4 6 8 row of garter stitch set up for body knit 37 45 60 stitches then m1r pm k1 m1l knit to end row 1 knit row 2 knit to marker m1r slip marker k1 m1l knit to end repeat row 1 & 2 until piece measures 4 6 8 or desired length finishing garter stitch edge row 1 purl row 2 knit to marker m1r slip marker k1 m1l knit to end row 3 purl bind off block piece weave in ends copyright sara crandall fox & gem this pattern is for personal use only this pattern may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered without permission
